official-title.#text: Expressing support for designation of October 2, 2014, as World MRSA Day.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

text.#text: supports the designation of World MRSA Day; and
supports the designation of International MRSA Testing Week.

in order to call attention to this worldwide epidemic; and

text.#text:

			 the MRSA epidemic and other multi-drug resistant health care-acquired

quote.#tail: in order to call attention to this worldwide epidemic: Now, therefore, be it

text.#text: Whereas the MRSA Survivors Network has announced that April 1–7, 2014, has been designated as
